issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
While the phone is in landscape, changing tabs lead to change orientation into portrait mode first then back to landscape.
This is not regression since the issue occurs in 3.0.0 GA as well.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Launch kitchensink.
2. Change orientation of phone to landscape. 
3. Change tab.

Actual:
The screen moves to portrait mode then moves back to landscape mode.

Expected:
The screen should not move to portrait mode until the phone is not moved to that direction.
fields.summary: IOS: Kitchensink - While the phone is in landscape, changing tabs lead to change orientation into portrait mode first then back to landscape.

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
